name: MetalsmithHelper
0:
”Alexa open metalsmith helper”
”tell me something about metal”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metalsmith helper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Metalsmith Helper is designed to provide spoken answers about Saw Blades, B & S gauge information and U.S. Ring Sizes. 
For Saw Sizes it can provide general information or recommend a drill bit size needed for piercing. 
For B & S gauges it can provide the gauge thickness in millimeters ot inches, match a gauge by inch (fraction) or recommend a drill bit size needed to match the specified gauge. 
For U.S Ring Sizes, it can provide the diameter or inside circumference in millimeters or inches. It can help find a U.S. ring size given millimeters or inches. It will also calculate the length of material needed, in millimeters, for a U.S ring size using a specific gauge. 
You can also ask for random information about metal.
